rules_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If that creature would deal damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead. If a source would deal damage to the creature this turn, it deals double that damage to the creature instead.
notes: fluffy: +to a permanent or player (The Flame of Keld), that creature—>the creature (Demonlord Belzenlok), if would be dealt—>if a source would deal (Goldnight Castigator)
